description: Listen to music just about anywhere without the hassle of running speaker wire! This high quality, weather-resistant speaker can even be used in wet areas. Bluetooth technology allows you to easily and quickly connect and listen to content from your Bluetooth enabled device at distances of up to 32ft (10m). Connect the speaker to your device by simply powering on the speaker, pressing the paring button on the speakers and selecting "AU Bluetooth Speaker" from the Bluetooth paring menu on your device.  Pair this speaker with any Bluetooth enabled device, including a smart phone, MP3 player, tablet or laptop for an enjoyable listening experience. The Audio Unlimited Bluetooth speaker is the perfect solution for adding music around the pool/spa, on the patio, near the BBQ, in your office, garage, in the garden, or out on the deck during those hot summer night. Electrical Characteristics :  Transmission Mode: Bluetooth® V2.1 + EDR.  Carrier Frequency: 2.402~2.480GHz.  Operation Voltage: Speaker, AC/DC 12V 1.0A Power Adaptor, or 6 X 'AA' size Alkaline Batteries (not included).  Frequency Response: 40Hz  12KHz. Distortion: 1.5% . S/N Ratio: 65dB .  Channel Separation: 30dB . Output Power: 2 x 3W (RMS)
title: C2G / Cables to Go Audio Unlimited Premium Indoor/Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker, Black (SPK-131U)
